messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Your Pokémon doesn’t seem to be tiring
at all from carrying you on its back.Let me see how strong it is!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I can’t take any more...
I’m all tired out!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
While floating here, I think about
everything and nothing.Like how I should battle next, and
what’s for dinner tomorrow, and...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
How much stronger have your Pokémon
become?Let me check ’em out, OK?
